summary: Family of Spriggans Domesticated, ready to follow you
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][color=#00ff00]For lovers of the Spriggans ...[/color][/center][/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
[/size][/color]
This is a spriggan family that are not hostile towards the player nor humans or elves, which have been abandoned in [color=#00ffff]Clearpine Pond.[/color]

In total there are 5:
[color=#00ff00]3 Spriggan tamed (Level 25)[/color]
[color=#ff7700]1 Matron Spriggan Domed (Level 50)[/color]
[color=#9900ff]1 Spriggan Mother Earth (Level 75)
[/color]
They are not essential, without wanting that they do not die uses the mod AFT or UFO.

Remember that they are still Spriggan, so if a follower of yours attacks some animal they will attack your follower. However, when your followers return they will already protect you instead of the animals, even fight against other enemy Spriggans!

100% Compatible with other follower mods like UFO and AFT.

Place in your data folder and activate.

Enjoy them!

Recommended Mods:
[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38488/?]Deadliest Dragons[/url][/size][size=5]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86228?]Deadliest Dragons - Dragon Nests[/url][/size]
[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86307?]HOP - Horses On Patrol - Dawnguard Armored Trolls[/url][/size]
author: TRAVIESO
